title: LittleAngell46 treacle tart
ingredients: ['Pastry', '360g plain flour', '180g unsalted butter', '100g caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '2 egg yolks', 'Filling', '300g golden syrup', '50g dark treacle', '150g fresh bread crumbs', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', '1 pinch salt']
